TopicTitle: New to the forums, not to KSP

Articles.Content: Hey all, I've been playing KSP for over a year now, and really jazzed about the Beta. However, I joined the forums for some trouble I'm trying to shoot, so if anyone can point me in the right direction of a thread on how to work the debug menu, it'd be a great start.

I don't know if there is one. Why don't you start one here?

Welcome to the forum.
Thanks! I wasn't sure if asking for tips on the debug menu would be kosher or not, but it is technically part of the game....
